tic_tac_toe module¶

tic_tac_toe.centerWindow(window)[fuente]¶

Centers the main window in the center of the screen canvas

Parámetros

window – Window that will be centered, mainly Tk()

tic_tac_toe.checkVictory()[fuente]¶

Check if a move is a winning move, if so, the game ends and tell the players who won

tic_tac_toe.closeGame()[fuente]¶

Close the game and end the python process

tic_tac_toe.placeChip(button, playerText)[fuente]¶

Places the correct chip in the correct cell when a player clicks the desired position

Args: button: Object Button from Tk library, it is the clicked button on which a chip will be placed on playerText: Current player indicator. It can be either [Player 1] or [Player 2]

tic_tac_toe.resetGame()[fuente]¶

Reset the game and create a new clean board

Tic Tac Toe Graphics
